item.title: Class 9 Girl Impregnated In Karnataka, Forced To Take Abortion Pills; 25-Year-Old Arrested
item.description:

In Raichur, Karnataka, Shivamurthy was arrested for impregnating a Class 9 student and forcing abortion pills, causing her critical illness.
